page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox setelementdisabled method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the item(s) in the view box to disable.

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the item in the view box to disable. Must be prefixed with a "#", for example "#button1".

argument.name: disabled
argument.description: Whether or not the element(s) are disabled.

page.description: Disable or enable individual elements in the view box. This works on both selectable (such as a list item) and non-selectable (such as a button) elements.
